name: Atlantis Cocktail Lounge
description: The Atlantis Cocktail Lounge offers a classic casino bar experience with expertly crafted cocktails, a wide selection of spirits, and a vibrant atmosphere on the casino floor. A popular gathering spot for guests between rounds of golf or a night on the town in downtown Reno.
shortDescription: Classic casino cocktail lounge with expertly crafted drinks at the Atlantis.

faqs.question: Where is the Cocktail Lounge?
faqs.answer: On the casino floor of the Atlantis, centrally located and easy to find.

faqs.question: What's the atmosphere like?
faqs.answer: Vibrant and lively with expertly crafted cocktails in a classic casino setting.

meta.title: Atlantis Cocktail Lounge – Casino Bar Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails at the Atlantis Cocktail Lounge on the casino floor in Reno.
